import{useEffect,useRef}from'react';/**
 * Returns the previous value of the given value
 *
 * @see https://reactjs.org/docs/hooks-faq.html#how-to-get-the-previous-props-or-state
 */var usePreviousValue=function usePreviousValue(value){var ref=useRef();useEffect(function(){ref.current=value;},[value]);return ref.current;};export default usePreviousValue;
